queries.name: number of remote connections
queries.sql: select COUNT(REMOTE_ADDRESS) as REMOTE_CONNECTIONS from qsys2.netstat_info where TCP_STATE = 'ESTABLISHED' AND REMOTE_ADDRESS != '::1' AND REMOTE_ADDRESS != '127.0.0.1'

queries.name: Plan Cache Analysis
queries.sql: CALL QSYS2.ANALYZE_PLAN_CACHE('03', '', '', BX'', '%'); select replace(upper(HEADING), ' ', '_') as HEADING, bigint(trim(TRANSLATE(VALUE ,  ' ', 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz(+-*/%=_&"''()<>,.:;?) ' ))) as val from QTEMP.QDBOP00003

queries.name: Named Temp Storage bucjets
queries.sql: select replace(upper(REPLACE(GLOBAL_BUCKET_NAME, '*','')), ' ', '_') as NAME, BUCKET_CURRENT_SIZE as CURRENT_SIZE, BUCKET_PEAK_SIZE as PEAK_SIZE from QSYS2.SystmpSTG where GLOBAL_BUCKET_NAME IS NOT NULL

queries.name: Unnamed Temp Storage buckets
queries.sql: select SUM(BUCKET_CURRENT_SIZE) as CURRENT_SIZE, sum(BUCKET_PEAK_SIZE) as PEAK_SIZE from QSYS2.SystmpSTG where GLOBAL_BUCKET_NAME IS NULL

queries.name: HTTP Server metrics
queries.sql: select SERVER_NAME concat '_' concat replace(HTTP_FUNCTION, ' ','_') as SERVER_FUNC, SERVER_NORMAL_CONNECTIONS, SERVER_SSL_CONNECTIONS, SERVER_ACTIVE_THREADS, SERVER_IDLE_THREADS, SERVER_TOTAL_REQUESTS, SERVER_TOTAL_REQUESTS_REJECTED, SERVER_TOTAL_RESPONSES, REQUESTS, RESPONSES, NONCACHE_RESPONSES, BYTES_RECEIVED, BYTES_SENT, NONCACHE_PROCESSING_TIME, CACHE_PROCESSING_TIME from qsys2.HTTP_SERVER_INFO
